𓂧 𓊪 𓏏 𓊛 chipot ship/boat ++

𐀡-𐀴-𐀫 po-ti-ro boaters, sailors

𒄑𒈣 giš.MÁ 𒄑𒈣 boat

𒄑𒈣 marine

Beden Beden-seyed Beden-safar

In the hierarchy of important inventions, boats and oars are difficult to rank.

log 𓆭 𓆮 󳽷 raft * 800.000 ?
